messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Unschooling conference/symposium opportunities
messages.msgSnippet: ... The conference rates go up after July 4th - so if you re thinking of coming, save some money by registering very soon. If you want a really really nice
messages.messageBody:
On Wed, Jun 20, 2012 at 11:31 PM, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:

> August 3-5 I'll speak each day at least once at the HSC conference in
> Sacramento (Pam Sorooshian, too, and maybe others who are on this list)
> http://www.hscconference.com/main.html
>

>>

The conference rates go up after July 4th - so if you're thinking of
coming, save some money by registering very soon.

If you want a really really nice family vacation - this conference is super
fun for the whole family - lots and lots of activities and things to do for
young children to teens.

-pam

messages.subject: Unschooling conference/symposium opportunities
messages.msgSnippet: I don t like much discussion of conferences on this list, but I m going to summarize a few things.  Hearing about unschooling in the presence of other people
messages.messageBody:
I don't like much discussion of conferences on this list, but I'm going to summarize a few things. Hearing about unschooling in the presence of other people who are also interested has a value that can't be reproduced in writing.

June 30 I'm speaking for a full day in Leiden, the Netherlands.
http://sandradoddleiden.wordpress.com/

July 15, I'm speaking for a full day in Ashford, Surrey, UK
http://www.lttl.org.uk/timings.html

August 3-5 I'll speak each day at least once at the HSC conference in Sacramento (Pam Sorooshian, too, and maybe others who are on this list)
http://www.hscconference.com/main.html

October 14-18 here (with Holly Dodd, speaking with me once. Keith will be there too, but not speaking.)
http://floridaunschoolingconference.com/
=================
There are only 10 days to get the early bird registration for the first Florida Unschooling Conference- Un in the Sun! Rates go up on July 1st!
The Florida Unschooling Conference | Un in the Sun
floridaunschoolingconference.com
Florida Unschooling Conference � Un in the Sun! October 14 � 18, 2012 Treasure Island Florida We are...
=================

December 27-29 in Albuquerque (with several people from this discussion!)
http://sandradodd.com/all/registration

2013 will have
Minnesota (in April with Jill Parmer and Alex Polikowsky) http://allunschoolingminnesota2013.blogspot.co.uk/
Lisbon (May, with Joyce Fetteroll and Marta Borges Pires) http://sandradoddemlisboa.blogspot.co.uk/
Selkirk, Scotland (with Joyce Fetteroll and Julie Daniel)
Probably near London again with Joyce Fetteroll
(possibly other places too, but I'm listing the most committed)
In fall, two or three cities in Australia with Joyce Fetteroll and Schuyler Waynforth
http://speakingsandradodd.blogspot.co.uk/

Sandra
